entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
